content: I'm investigating the impact of social media marketing on consumer purchasing decisions. I'm specifically looking at how influencer marketing affects brand awareness and customer loyalty. I've already searched through Google Scholar and Scopus using keywords like "influencer marketing," "brand awareness," and "customer loyalty," but I'm not sure if I've covered all the relevant studies. I'd like to focus on studies published in the last 2 years, as my research aims to provide an up-to-date understanding of this topic.
